class.name: EventStateTest

method.name: g
method.comment: the bug corresponding to issue 695 causes the g function
to be called at obsolete times t despite an event
occurring later has already been triggered.
When this occurs, the following assertion is violated

method.name: eventOccurred
method.comment: remember in a class variable when the event was triggered
